data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=54EEnTUdgqoQ7kNvgHr2wVr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuu3DRoKjViiUENV92u4fbCWoyurRq-gx9lGzlfn6bYA&oe=665B069C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bg4O-7ypXToQ7kNvgExmuVq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC_FXt8JcNPA_AbpUk4ug11N1P4jkOAEz8bEZEHj9pBQA&oe=665B1024)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dkN5mkb3F1EQ7kNvgE0MKRs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_moidP10Z7-ruwo0XMUSGcLp9U5q8QEMQa7AU1PLGuw&oe=665AF787)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DXov9V5AsCQQ7kNvgHya8Xy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDUHr3M8rl8blceWmraWbKutfLVoOABS7ccB1FVeOjfxg&oe=665AEA66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GuF-CzX-i9MQ7kNvgHlyBr4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA0M_VNPJB0FZCeh0m6HI6Ca6NQlZN52GBA6BvPO1JpCQ&oe=665B16D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YUxsIInYzsYQ7kNvgEePwXG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBnfs-hoFwuQEXwUX6NFdbAuAkRZ0qqL-AEhqq2lneKbg&oe=665B1359)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xM0mPbjJQy0Q7kNvgEvuea_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDH9AiY7on4LN14vI3eY3pbcJNhmqYJ8myqpR83JU0OjA&oe=665AF970)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gkKG71mngrsQ7kNvgH3OLos&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAO0hLjRH2SSpO-xNTrNOGuxmijNYdGFoIdsszcjKxbLQ&oe=665AE3EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZO-Kl2cFuiAQ7kNvgFFa9aB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDNYDDCa8oPH5cN-4hUlkYMaN1ib-RQbY1KawCettk3TQ&oe=665AF797)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Bi5VE425HqgQ7kNvgE5LusY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCF-9wkwVvJV0Ek11MtkL8G8GkIXzpb4Rj1RjuKD0l9xg&oe=665B130C)
